column2: "Little girl"
"Hmph... Is this the best ARKS can do?"
"My, my. And it was thanks to whom that you made it this far at all?"
"Don't you dare think I owe you anything for this."
"...where is that child, anyway?"
"Patience... just keep up the rampage and she'll be sure drop in."
"Now if you'll excuse me, my part in these preparations is complete. Be sure to do your best, okay maggot?"
"...Feh! Arrogant dog, acting high and mighty. Pisses me off."
"Sniff... Where... is everyone...?"
"What's wrong, little one? Have you lost your way?"
"Eeek...!"
"Those eyes... remind me of that child. That cocky girl!!"
"Oops, dead already? What a shame, little one. Curse that little girl, not me!"
"...speak of the devil!"
"How does it look, Clarissa?"
"Compound injuries and juvenile stage make the infection terminal. Virtually no chance of recovery."
"And if you link with her to purify and regenerate, then?"
"...Good chance of survival. This course is not recommended. Your battle strength will be severely reduced..."
"I don't care, do it. Purify her via the Link. Also, aid her for the retreat."
"...Please confirm. Are you sure you want to proceed with these orders?"
"I'm not ordering you to do anything! Please, Clarissa. Do this for me."
"Are you okay?"
"That's a good girl."
"This is Clarissa, the magical silver staff. She can erase the darkness and keep you safe, so stay calm and make your way out of here."
"B-but... what about you?"
"...Don't worry. Big sis is a hero, here to protect everyone."
"You threw away your weapon to protect that filth... you're out of your mind, ARKS!"
"That staff was all you had for support, and it was the source of your power, was it not?"
"What can you do without it? Don't tell me you intend to defeat me?"
"The cries, the wounds, the sadness, the pain..."
"If I had just finished you back in the desert, none of this would have happened."
"I will kill you here. Erase you. Obliterate you. Destroy you!"
"I will not defeat you. I will wipe you from existence!"
"...Try it, little girl!"
"...these are the events of the infamous Dark Falz attack 10 years ago."
"She must be deeper inside. Please hurry. We have to find out what happened."
"Not the Reason I Was Born"
"Ch.6 わたしがうまれたそのりゆう"
